markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Well of Potential](/Feats.aspx?ID=3974) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 44</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
focus pool, at least one innate spell from a
kashrishi heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at
least one of your focus spells

</column>

---

Your mind is a deep well of psychic potential. You regain 1 Focus Point, up to your usual maximum.
name: Well of Potential
prerequisite:
focus pool, at least one innate spell from a
kashrishi heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at
least one of your focus spells
